name: Toys Gun Fire Boom
description: A small action game 4 players, each for yourself or in cooperation, in a destructible decor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 440 or AMD Radeon HD 5550 w/ 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 Processor: Dual-core 3Ghz CPU Graphics: DirectX® 10 compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
